caption:
Weather Update! Regretfully, this event has been cancelled due to inclement weather. All attendees have been emailed. We look forward to next year! 🐰 
_____________________

🌸🐣 Join Scripted Fragrance for the ultimate Easter Egg Hunt on April 12 at our studio in Warwick, New York! 🌿✨ Find hidden treasures, take home limited edition candles, and celebrate spring with us. 🌷🔥 

Pre-registration required, link in bio with details. Don’t miss out—tag your friends and let the hunt begin! 💛 

Easter Egg Hunt
Scripted Fragrance 
Luxury Candles 
Hudson Valley
